name: dirtyantaeus
text: Hint that Todd is the one who stole Ray's Nachos.

text: Holy shit.

text: SO then...Who stole Ray's laundry?

name: ferdinand
text:
nachos feature prominently in achewood. is this because they are awesome?

i think it is.

name: peterjoel
text: In this case, I think it merely indicates that some of the research was to just ask people at the Nacho place what they thought of Todd.

name: spinynorman
text:
There is probably a Venn Diagram of People Who Read Achewood compared to People Who Like Nachos

It's just one circle, that's all

name: heccibiggs
text:
Well, lots of people like nachos, I mean they're pretty hard not to like. But not everyone likes Achewood because, as has been discussed previously, some people just don't "get" it.

So, I think the venn diagram would should that all Achewood fans are people who like nachos, but all people who like nachos are not Achewood fans.

name: heccibiggs
text: A comment left by heccibiggs was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by littlecat, d3lvn, gmontag)

name: mikeronomicon
text: I chubbied both of your comments just to make up for the lame, uh, lames from others.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Good idea.

name: overmedicated
text: Better than being slapped in the face with a chubby, I'd have thought.

name: dissembly
text: I find that it really depends on the chubby.

name: saint
text:
I don't understand, therefore I'm intimidated an dislike this...
But I sure do love nachos.

name: zapatos
text: It is difficult for me to believe I learned this skill from my Math class.  What do Venn Diagrams have to with Math, really.

name: zapatos
